Requirements

 * erlang: http://ftp.sunet.se/pub/lang/erlang/index.html
 * make
 * unixodbc: for unix systems
 * odbc drivers for the database types you use (mysql, oracle, freetds)

Installation

 * get source code from svn trunk/oreste
 * cd oreste
 * cd deps/webmachine/deps/mochiweb & make clean & make
 * cd deps/webmachine/ & make clean & make
 * make clean & make
